title: Software Testing (Java Selenium)
shortDescription: Learn Manual + Automation Testing with Selenium, TestNG, and frameworks.
description: Comprehensive training on SDLC, STLC, test design, Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, framework design, CI/CD basics, and real-time projects.

title: Automation Testing (Python Selenium)
shortDescription: Python-based automation with Selenium, PyTest, and POM.
description: Hands-on automation using Python, Selenium, PyTest, POM, fixtures, reporting, and integration with CI.

title: Java Full Stack Development
shortDescription: Frontend + Backend with React and Spring Boot.
description: HTML/CSS/JS, React basics, Java, Spring Boot REST APIs, JPA/Hibernate, MySQL, deployment. Real project included.

title: REST API Testing
shortDescription: Postman + REST Assured for backend testing.
description: Deep dive into API testing strategies using Postman and REST Assured, authentication, schema validation, and automation.
